She woke up to in the otherworldy.
The monsters are coming after her!
The door was locked.
That's hot Strip Escape Game.
The room is full of mysteries.
She have got to overcame hardships.

This game is a game where you play escape.
You can change your language settings(English and Japanese).

Description of the main features and content of the game:
Move the main character with the direction key.
Z key or click the right mouse button is cancel.
Z key or click the right mouse button is cancel.
X key or click the right mouse button is menu.
At the event, you can enjoy the character's Nudity or Sexual event.
It gets faster and harder, but you can succeed.


All the characters in this are over 18 years of age.


About the gameplay and features:
This is an escape game to play with mysteries and gimmicks.
I'll move her with the mouse and arrow keys, touch and check.
You can run with shift keyboard.
At the event she undresses.
The game ends when you leave the room.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
